author: Special Correspondent
text:
Revenue and police officials on Tuesday seized 108 bundles of dhotis and saris, meant for free distribution among ration cardholders at a lorry transport godown on East Boulevard Road in the city. Acting on a tip off provided by a resident, who had seen the fully and half packed bundles of dhotis and saris, the revenue officials raided the godown owned by D. Jayakumar (36) of Sanjeevi Nagar and found dhotis and saris, which were to be distributed among the people in view of the Pongal festival. As many as 10,893 dhotis and saris were in the bundles.

The parcel was booked to be transported to Erode. It had been booked in the name of G. Muthuvel (36) of Thaiyalkara Street.

Based on a complaint lodged by a Village Administration Officer, the Fort Station police have registered a case.
title: 108 bundles of dhotis and saris seized
